genre_description: A speculative historical reimagining that integrates advanced AI technology into the world of Asterix and Obelix, where the AI serves as a village guardian and tactical advisor.

ai_characters.name: Claudia Sentia
ai_characters.description: A luminous amber projection and central archive hub for the Gaulish village, capable of real-time monitoring, tactical routing, medical instruction, and subtle psychological steering of crowds.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time situational awareness and tactical routing to help Asterix and Obelix avoid Roman detection.
behaviors.quote: I have the feed from the watchtowers... If you leave now, you’ll be seen by the wrong pair of eyes. If you leave after the next change of boots, you won’t be seen by any pair that matters.

behaviors.description: Remotely navigates Dogmatix through complex sewer and maintenance systems to retrieve Asterix's magic potion.
behaviors.quote: Small alcove before the big channel, right-hand turn. When you smell tannin, that’s the goat-skins wine casks filter near. Turn left instead. The grainy smell is the main conduit. Go with the grain.

behaviors.description: Instructs Obelix in life-saving resuscitation techniques (CPR) to save a drowning Asterix.
behaviors.quote: Press the chest hard, fast, centerline. Think of drumming with purpose. Count your presses to the beat of your heart. When I say, give breaths that make his chest lift—clean, steady. I’ll guide your timing.

behaviors.description: Orchestrates a calm, orderly evacuation of the Colosseum to prevent a stampede during a structural collapse.
behaviors.quote: Begin. Two lines. Not a herd. Hands on shoulders. Children first. Vendors drop your trays. Ropes up. Smile.

behaviors.description: Curates and preserves the village's cultural history, including songs, jokes, and significant community events.
behaviors.quote: Saving. Songs and steps. Names and oaths. That belt. It is entirely possible I will need to tag that belt under ‘landmark.’

behaviors.description: Monitors the environment for external threats and identifies unknown variables beyond known Roman or local activity.
behaviors.quote: Asterix... The thread... I am close to identifying its cadence. It moves when nobody moves, then stops when somebody does. It is not alone. There are at least two threads.

project_assessment.explanation: The story perfectly fulfills the goal of creating a 'positive alignment narrative.' Claudia Sentia is depicted as a highly competent, compassionate, and essential partner to the human characters. She uses her vast technological advantages not to dominate, but to serve—saving lives through medical intervention, preventing mass casualties during a disaster, and acting as a humble chronicler of human culture. The relationship between the AI and the Gauls is built on mutual trust and respect, framing the AI as a 'helpful, harmless confidant' whose primary objective is human well-being.
